mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( board_idx, contents, creator_id, created_datetime ) VALUES ( #{boardIdx}, #{contents}, 'admin', NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT comment_idx, contents, creator_id, DATE_FORMAT(created_datetime, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_datetime FROM comment WHERE board_idx = #{boardIdx} AND deleted_yn = 'N' ORDER BY comment_idx DESC
